sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import Title from './Title' import { tours } from '../data' function Tours() { return (
</div> <div className="section-center featured-center"> {tours.map((tour) => { const { id, image, date, title, info, location, duration, price } = tour return ( <article className="tour-card" key={id}> <div className="tour-img-container"> <img src={image} className="tour-img" alt="" /> <p className="tour-date">{date}</p> </div> <div className="tour-info"> <div className="tour-title"> <h4>{title}</h4> </div> <p>{info}</p> <div className="tour-footer"> <p> <span> <i className="fas fa-map"></i> </span> {location} </p> <p>{duration}</p> <p>{price}</p> </div> </div> </article> ) })} </div> </section> ) } export default Tours
